Dashboards and Analytics

Get complete visibility and control of your end-to-end supply chain operations through Liveasy's intelligent dashboard. Access real-time data-driven insights and automation tools for logistics, all in one place.

How Does it Work?

Intelligent TMS Platform

Manage all your shipments efficiently across rail, road, air, and sea with our Intelligent Transportation Management System (TMS) platform. Our centralized dashboard provides real-time visibility into shipment status, routes, and performance metrics, streamlining logistics operations.

Get All Your Bids Sorted

Consolidate all your bids in one location. Gather quotes from various LSP and select the one that fits your budget best. This streamlined approach allows you to compare and choose the most suitable bid for your needs.

All In-Plant Vehicle Movement

Comprehensive Analytics for Management

Gain critical logistics insights with our analytics feature. Monitor placement efficiency, ratings, loading and unloading times, halt durations, transit details, turnaround times, and more. Optimize your logistics operations with actionable data for informed decision-making.

SIM-Based Tracking for Full Transperency

Implement SIM-based tracking to ensure full transparency and visibility into vehicle operations. By utilizing SIM cards integrated with GPS tracking technology, you can monitor vehicle locations and movements in real-time. This approach provides accurate data on routes taken, stops made, and overall vehicle status.

Manage and get all funds settled at once
